subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Foster Care
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: With the odds stacked against her, Angelica Bermudez overcame family issues and a rocky start at Kean University and is now close to landing a spot on a women’s professional team in Puerto Rico.
snippet: With the odds stacked against her, Angelica Bermudez overcame family issues and a rocky start at Kean University and is now close to landing a spot on a women’s professional team in Puerto Rico.
